data.name: Drugs and Crime Idle - Money Laundering DLC
data.detailed_description:
The second DLC for the game "Drugs and Crime Idle".

This DLC makes all future businesses used for laundering money in the game available for purchase, once they are all implemented into the game.
The first business "Stacey's Nail Salon" is available for all players for free without the need for the DLC. All future business will be locked behind the DLC.

You also get the following as claimable reward in-game. Claimable 1 time per save game.
- 30 Idle Bux (exchange for dirty money)
- 5 Possible Crates
- 5 Impossible Crates
- 2 Gold Bars
- $200 clean money.

Thank you for the support! Enjoy!

data.short_description: This DLC makes all future businesses used for laundering money in the game available for purchase. The first business "Stacey's Nail Salon" is available for all players for free. You also get a little bit of extra claimable rewards in-game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires the free game "Drugs and Crime Idle"
